How you doing, Choom!
Welcome to Erlsn's Delight!
Computer Science, Mathematics, Music, ACG, and my daily life!

About

朝著電腦科學前進中！有興趣的研究領域是機器學習, 凸最佳化
閒暇之餘的興趣是ACG、網球、樂器(吉他、貝斯)。目前正在學習日文中！
I aspire to become a computer scientist with a strong interest in Machine Learning and Convex Optimization.
In my free time, I also enjoy watching anime/comic, playing video games, tennis, and guitar/bass.
日本語を勉強します
